channel.title: Date on Simple Solution
channel.description: Recent content in Date on Simple Solution

item.title: Convert Joda-Time DateTime into Date in Java
item.description: In this Joda-Time tutorial, we learn how to convert a Joda-Timeâ€™s DateTime object into a java.util.Date object in Java. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Add Joda Time library to your Java project To use Joda Time Java library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependency into the build.gradle file. compile group: 'joda-time', name: 'joda-time', version: '2.10.9' To use Joda Time Java library in the Maven build project, add the following dependency into the pom.

item.title: Joda Time LocalDateTime by Examples in Java
item.description: In this Java tutorial, we learn how to use the org.joda.time.LocalDateTime class of Joda Time library by different example Java programs.
